data.title: Bruce Willis turns 69 as actor expected to spend day with family and ex Demi
data.meta_description: Bruce Willis celebrated his 68th birthday with all five of his daughters and ex wife Demi Moore, and the same is expected to happen today.
data.text:
Bruce Willis, the star of Die Hard, celebrated his 68th birthday with all five of his daughters and his ex-wife Demi Moore.

As the actor turns 69 today, it's expected all his family will come to together again.

The rare family photo came after his diagnosis of frontotemporal dementia last year.

The actor, who has been taking a break from acting since March 2022, was surrounded by his girls in the group picture.

His wife Emma Heming Willis and ex-wife actress Demi were also present, along with their daughters Rumer, Scout, and Tallulah, whom he shares with Demi, as well as Mabel and Evelyn, his daughters with Emma.

Read More: Gene Wilder's emotional final words to wife before sad death from Alzheimer's

The family posed casually against a lush backdrop under a grey Los Angeles sky.

More photos from the gathering showed the family honouring their patriarch, including a sweet snapshot of daughters Rumer, Scout, and Tallulah snuggling up to their father.

Bruce and Demi even took a selfie with their youngest daughter Tallulah and two dogs.

The family spent quality time together on the patio, with Bruce keeping warm in a quilted jacket and a thick grey scarf.

DON'T MISS...

Tom Hardy’s odd on-set request left famous photographer ‘hiding behind a tree' [INSIGHT]

Glenn Close sparks major fan concern with bruised face in new Instagram selfie [HEALTH]

Demi Moore reunites with Bruce Willis to celebrate birthday as dementia worsens [NEWS]

Demi shared these photos with the caption: "More from Bruce's birthday yesterday."

Fans were showing their love for the family, with one saying: "Much love to you all. What a beautiful example of good humans x".

Another commented: "All the kids visibly soaking in the moments with their Dad."

"Family first... You all are beautiful humans. Happy birthday to the man of this Tribe. Take good care of you all," wrote another fan.

Demi, who was once married to Bruce for 13 years before they split in 2000, also shared a lovely birthday message for her former husband.

She put up a video on Instagram of Bruce surrounded by his family as they sang happy birthday and gave him a cake.

Demi said in her Instagram post: "Happy birthday, BW! So glad we could celebrate you today.

"Love you and love our family. Thank you to everyone for the love and warm wishes - we all feel them."
